name: Elan Doree
overview: Elan Doreé (AKA Touryuu Densetsu: Elan Doreé) is originally a ST-V arcade from the unknown developer Sai-Mate. This game adds a lot of new aspects to traditional fighting games, like flying dragons and magic attacks. Each character rides a dragon which means that you're actually supposed to be flying at all times. Most of the fighting takes place on a 2D plane, but you do have complete freedom of 3D movement.
